alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 8:28PM EDT until April 06 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Central Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 828 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Thomasville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Moncrief, Dillon, Patten, Eason, Merrillville, Pine Park, Newark, Pasco, Beachton, Hollis and Oaklawn. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
